description: Definition of the AWS::QuickSight::Dashboard Resource Type.

LineWidth.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

Parameters.description: A list of Amazon QuickSight parameters and the list's override values.

StringParameters.description: The parameters that have a data type of string.

DecimalParameters.description: The parameters that have a data type of decimal.

IntegerParameters.description: The parameters that have a data type of integer.

DateTimeParameters.description: The parameters that have a data type of date-time.

DataPointDrillUpDownOption.description: The drill down options for data points in a dashbaord.

AxisOffset.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

Name.description: A display name for the date-time parameter.
A display name for the decimal parameter.

ViolatedEntities.description: Lists the violated entities that caused the dashboard error.

Width.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

ExportWithHiddenFieldsOption.description: Determines whether or not hidden fields are visible on exported dashbaords.

Absolute.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

Height.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

YAxisLocation.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px with Integer.MAX_VALUE as maximum value

Width.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

XAxisLocation.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

Width.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

ValidationStrategy.description: The option to relax the validation that is required to create and update analyses, dashboards, and templates with definition objects. When you set this value to LENIENT, validation is skipped for specific errors.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

CreatedTime.description: The time that this dashboard version was created.

DataSetArns.description: The Amazon Resource Numbers (ARNs) for the datasets that are associated with this version of the dashboard.

ThemeArn.description: The ARN of the theme associated with a version of the dashboard.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

VersionNumber.description: Version number for this version of the dashboard.

Sheets.description: A list of the associated sheets with the unique identifier and name of each sheet.

Actions.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

Principal.description:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

  • The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.)

  • The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.)

  • The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.)

SheetLayoutElementMaximizationOption.description: The sheet layout maximization options of a dashbaord.

OptimizedViewPortWidth.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

Sheet.description: A sheet, which is an object that contains a set of visuals that are viewed together on one page in Amazon QuickSight. Every analysis and dashboard contains at least one sheet. Each sheet contains at least one visualization widget, for example a chart, pivot table, or narrative insight. Sheets can be associated with other components, such as controls, filters, and so on.

SheetId.description: The unique identifier associated with a sheet.

Name.description: The name of a sheet. This name is displayed on the sheet's tab in the Amazon QuickSight console.

Height.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

DefaultCellWidth.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

OptimizedViewPortWidth.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

ExportHiddenFieldsOption.description: Determines if hidden fields are included in an exported dashboard.

GeospatialSolidColor.description: Describes the properties for a solid color

Height.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

Width.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

DataPointMenuLabelOption.description: The data point menu options of a dashboard.

Name.description: A display name for a string parameter.

MarkerSize.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

Left.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit

Top.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit

Right.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit

Bottom.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit

Tag.description: The key or keys of the key-value pairs for the resource tag or tags assigned to the resource.

GeospatialColorState.description: Defines view state of the color

BorderThickness.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

GutterSpacing.description: String based length that is composed of value and unit in px

DashboardVisualPublishOptions.description: The visual publish options of a visual in a dashboard

CreatedTime.description: The time that this dashboard was created.

LastUpdatedTime.description: The last time that this dashboard was updated.

LastPublishedTime.description: The last time that this dashboard was published.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
